title: Top notch experience
text:
Top notch experience with a special thanks to our driver Shahid. He was so polite and explained the schedule tour for us properly and he gave amazing ideas for when we stopped to take photos for sunset. Highly recommend him as if we go next time we will definitely choose him.
The tour included buggy’s, camel ride, dune bashing followed by a bbq/dessert dinner, fire show, tannoura dance and belly dancing.
place: Red Sand Dunes Desert Safari, BBQ Dinner, Camel Ride, Sand Boarding In Dubai

title: Average hotel, woudnt return
text: the hotel itself and the rooms are nice, however we didn't get a balcony with our room which was a bit disappointing. the pool is filled with a lot of children if you're looking for a relaxing place i don't suggest this hotel its more family friendly with loud kids, the music wasn't loud at the pool area.. The restaurant options weren't great as both of them had nearly the same menu, the food presentation wasn't up to the standards, food was bland lacking flavor in everything we ordered except for the Tom Yum soup. we told the waitress we will be eating in a sharing style and they never got us plates so me and my husband has to eat from the dish in the middle of the table. Also when we finished our meals they wouldn't remove the empty dishes off our table which was super weird. Overall i wouldn't return again. The check in and check out process takes around 15-20 mins per person it was so long. i know this is new hotel and they have room for improvements. Also i couldn't sleep properly as in the hallway you can hear people chatting and laughing so it was disturbing.

title: Such a lovely restaurant with delicious food and outstanding hospitality
text: It was our time for me and my husband to dine at Ammos. Tony the manager was so kind, polite, friendly & helpful in assisting us with the food selection and drinks. Dubai needs more managers like him. He had an honest opinion and wasnt pushy at all. He also surprised us with a dessert for our anniversary dinner. I love Greek food and can easily suggest Ammos for people to try out as they wont regret it. Cant wait to return and try other food options :D

title: Authentic Mexican restaurant
text:
We had a wonderful experience at the restaurant, they had a mariachi band playing and singing a couple of times which gives you the authentic Mexican experience. They are very talented as well as the drummer who shook things up and pumped up the crowd. Food was tasty but overpriced in my opinion. We sat downstairs for dinner which was a calmer vibe but we moved upstairs around midnight and this is where the party started, they had salsa dancers and drummer entertaining the crowd.
Overall we had a lovely experience thanks to Fernando and Christian who were always attentive to us.
I absolutely loved that all the staff are Latin it really adds the authentic touch.

title: Moscow's most Iconic cathedral
text: so beautiful with alot of history and hand work in the designs. Tickets are cheap so worth viewing it out.

title: this is a must and worth it
text: this is the worlds most beautiful metro with so much history behind. definitely recommend taking a guided tour who can explain the history of the metro stations. there was one station which i dont remember the name of but people hid their for a few months during the war and we also visited a station that had the deepest depth in the world. the Metro was a gift to the people of Russia and for people to have an easier way of traveling. i got my tickets from get our guide app and the name of the company dont remember but i remember our guides name was Kirill, he was wonderful and fun and gave us alot of info.

title: nice scenery and outstanding customer service
text: this is the best way of travelling instead of getting on a plane. when on the train you have the scenery and time passes quick we traveled from St Petersburg to Moscow. their service was wonderful, waitresses smile and were attentive. you also get 2000 rubles deposit when purchasing your ticket so you can spend it on the food and drinks. their toilets are very clean and the movement of the plane is very smooth and calm.

title: Stunning view and high quality food
text: the atmosphere is calm and a must try. their food menu is filled with an wide variety and everything we ordered tasted so delicious. High quality food and our waitress was very helpful with choosing our dishes and was attentive to us. i would go back again to dine when i return to St Pete's. Also the view was astonishing its a perfect place for a date night or to come with friends.

title: Not bad, wouldn't return again.
text: The interiors looked nice but the service was dissapointing as the waiters were slow and would stare in a weird way. Food took a long while to reach our table. Prices were expensive but food tasted good. The atmosphere is loud with people talking, not much music going on.

title: Beautiful Burj Khalifa view by the terrace.
text: Outstanding view of the Burj Khailfa but on weekends theres a minimum charge of 350 AED per person if you want to sit on the Burj view terrace outside. Their food was outstanding and I was highly impressed. The waiters had a wide knowledge with what drinks would go best with our food, they were very friendly and joking.

title: Take me back to Greece
text: First of all, the interiors made me feel so close to Greece, the food was delicious and the prices weren't that bad. Note that you can only sit there for 2 hours which isn't bad. The best part was mix of Arabic/Greek music they play and then they perform their traditional Sirtaki dance with plate smashing. First restaurant in Dubai with such entertainment and beautiful interiors. Make sure to book well ahead of time as they are always fully booked.

title: A night of Latin Tropicana
text: The interiors of this place are so beautiful, almost like a tropical jungle and the vibes of the music, as well as I noticed if incase someone breaks a glass, the waiters start clapping. so its. Drinks menu is fun with a range of variety.

title: Walk through History
text: It was such a beautiful experience to have walked up a hill which was quite hot and a bit tiring plus standing in the queue but well worth it. the Acropolis is well maintained and it took me back to my history classes when they would teach us about the Greek Gods. Its just Astonishing to walk through history.

title: Great quality of food And price
text: They serve big portions which consists of delicious authentic food along with very affordable prices. They also have zorba dancing with plate smashing. Staff are friendly and the atmosphere is lit. Highly recommend it.

title: Impeccable Service & arrangement
text:
I would like to thank Rochdi & the team for all of your cooperation. The table setting, service and cake were impeccable and i was very impressed.

Thank you for arranging this smoothly for my engagement dinner. always keep returning back to the palmery.

title: valet parking
text: the employees at valet parking couldn't find my keys for 20 mins which worried me a lot & on top of that whenever i asked what happened to my keys & wheres my car they ignored me even when i raised my voice louder. U had to help them find my keys which i couldn't either but after sometime they found it and my valet ticket had a stamp in red clearly saying its paid, the man at the valet asked where is the 2nd ticket i said when i drove in i was given only 1 ticket and he kept arguing with me and i mentioned may times that it says i paid already anyway & asked to get my car. but they kept torturing me without giving my car back. it was the most stressful & upsetting experience i ever had in Dubai valets. its a shame i had to yell & get into tears thinking my car was given to someone else or keys were lost. eventually got my car back after all this trouble.
place: V Hotel Dubai, Curio Collection by Hilton

title: first time experience was amazing
text:
the place is beautiful inside & out, its a chilled place but Wednesday nights (ladies night) its gets super busy which i like still. we had a very kind & attentive waiter Miroslav who not only served us but also educated us on the Japanese food & drinks which was very interesting for us. the food was delicious & so were the drinks.
so worth a try! i will always continue to return there.

title: perfect winter hangout outdoor lounge
text: beautiful place by a gorgeous burj khalifa view, good for group hangouts or a date. the food was divine there. music gets louder & better the later you stay :) staff were attentive & friendly.

title: Gorgeous lounge
text: Such a beautiful place and atmosphere but unfortunately the staff have become rude and give attitude it wasnt like that when they first opened up. We dont feel comfortable even sitting there sometimes all because of the staffs attitude.

title: Top experience
text: Food was delicious and served quick. Great selection of drinks. The atmosphere gets busier towards evening time with lovely choice of music they play. Staff were very friendly and attentive and fun.

title: Stunning view
text: The view was absolutely stunning with an amazing selection of music. Food was served quick not to mention it was delicious. Met a very friendly helpful man that works there dont know his name but he is always standing at the front of the restaurant. The lady that works there doesn't smile much nor communicate.

title: Yummy breakfast
text: Came to kamari twice and always went to have breakfast at Levante. Huge portion sizes for an omlette and tasted great. Gets busy towards 6 pm onwards. Its a chilled out place with a beautiful view of the kamari black beach. Attentive staff.

title: Great atmosphere
text: Friendly staff and great atmosphere for the evening time which turns into a mini outdoor club with great hits. Katarina was our waitress most of the times we came there she was very friendly and suggested us top picks on the food menu which were authentic Santorini. Great margaritas

title: Beautiful beach view
text: Delicious food served quickly and most importantly staff wasnt nagging for us to come into the restaurant and was so friendly to have a conversation with. A complimentary dessert was served to us which was a choc foundant with ice cream it was so tasty. The interior design was modern and clean and has a perfect view by the beach and great music selection

title: Good to dine by the beach
text: Went to the beach at Alismari nearly everyday. Doni was a very helpful friendly waiter by the beach and food was served extremely quick. Although the manager seemed abit unfriendly since we came there everyday which should be the opposite.

title: Heavenly view
text: The view says it all such beach interior design, food took some time to be served but tased great! Only available for dinner no drinks.

title: Astonishing view
text: This bar is only for drinks, has great music and gorgeous view of the fira white houses. Waiters were attentive and friendly.

title: Great location
text: This is the 2nd time to stay at finikas hotel. The location is perfect less than 1 min walk to the beach and resturants. Rooms are clean and neat. Breakfast costs 5 euros and serves the basic food. Eleni was always very helpful and kind during our stay and we hope to come back again the 3rd time.

title: Good location
text: Located in city of athens 10 min walk to the touristic scenes. Wifi kept disconnecting and kettle wouldnt walk. Great selection of breakfast so authentic greek and delicious. Staff were friendly. Elevator was extremely small and uncomfortable.
